item.title: By: Elaine
item.dc:creator: Elaine
item.description: My mother always used to make these for me as well, and now that she's an Oma she makes them for my daughter. She never made them with milk though, so I can't wait to try them this way. She simply used eggs, sugar, and flour . . . I've never tried them w/out sugar . . .
item.content:encoded: My mother always used to make these for me as well, and now that she’s an Oma she makes them for my daughter. She never made them with milk though, so I can’t wait to try them this way. She simply used eggs, sugar, and flour . . . I’ve never tried them w/out sugar . . .
